derivation: or שְׁמָרִימוֹת; probably from H8034 (שֵׁם) and plural of H7413 (רָמָה); name of heights;
outline:
Shemiramoth = "name of heights"
  1. a Merarite Levite in the second rank in the choir of David
  2. a Levite in the time of king Jehoshaphat of Judah
strongs_def: Shemiramoth, the name of two Israelites
